::KitKat::

Her body shook uncontrollably as she lay there unconsious on the 
ground.  She dreamed of revenge on the Maximals and reclaiming her 
leadership position.  She dreamed of reaping large amounts of energon 
and enough to share among the others. She dreamed of a Predacon ruled 
planet. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream watched Terrorsaur take off.
> 
> "Great! Another of us left! That makes four. Who do we have left? 
Me, 
> you Drillbit, Phobia, Goldeneye, Dollen and a near death KitKat. 
All 
> that remains of Megatron's vicious army. And where is our great 
> leader? HE SHOULD BE HERE!! HE'S IN CHARGE!!!!"
> 
> Starscream walked off and sat on a rock, obviously upset. He looks 
up 
> at the rest.
> 
> "5 of us....not including KitKat. My vote for Phoiba still stands. 
> Our great leader flees, our second in command his near death, and 
her 
> replacement doesn't want the job. We have to pick between 
ourselves. 
> First to receive 3 votes wins. No voting for yourself. In the event 
> of a tie we all vote again but only for the people who tied. What 
do 
> you say?"
